location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.370 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Commodore George Robinson, Commanding Officer Persian Gulf Squadron

mods.abstract: Kemball informs Robinson that he has received intelligence of two 'highly suspicious' boats positioned on the Persian coast of the Gulf, seeking to apprehending merchant vessels. Kemball requests that Robinson issue orders to the officers of the Queenand Tigristo patrol the areas in which the two boats have been sighted.
